name: Project: Bumper
description:
~~Overview

Project Bumper is a Multiplayer versus experience for 2-4 players.

In the future there is a game show broadcasted across the universe.

You play as various customizable characters driving heavily armed, futuristic dodgems in an attempt to knock your opponents out of the arena and become the victor!

Although the game is currently in a pre-alpha build, we have lots of systems we would like to implement before the full release, here are a few;

- A main menu

- Character and ship customization

- 3 classes with different special attacks

- A shield and burst

Note: Currently only local multiplayer is available!

~~Controls

Currently only Xinput controller is supported

Move:   Left analog stick

Look:   Right analog stick

Fire guns:   Right Bumper

Charge Special:   Right Trigger

Dash:   Left Trigger

Pause:   Start

Keyboard F :   Add player

Keyboard V :   Remove player

Keyboard R :   Force restart level

Keyboard Alt+F4 :   Quit game
